en.title: Canada's Forest Trust Net-Zero Calculator
en.para1: Calculate how many acres your corporation must invest in to reach a net-zero emissions target
en.para1School: Calculate how many acres your school must invest in to reach a net-zero emissions target
en.para1Personal: Calculate how many acres you must invest in to reach a net-zero emissions target
en.emissionsPlaceholder: Carbon footprint in tonnes per year
en.emissionsRegion: In which region is your corporation based?
en.emissionsRegionSchool: In which region is your school located?
en.emissionsRegionPersonal: What region do you live in?
en.emissionsTimeHeader: How long do you want to be carbon neutral? (Years)
en.dataDisclaimer: This is an estimate of your average carbon footprint per year.
en.bookmark: To continue editing your results in the future, save or bookmark this link:
en.nextPara: Calculate how many acres of Smart Forest you need to invest in to reach a Net-Zero emissions target.
en.otherHeader: Get Started with our Carbon Calculators
en.otherbox1Para: Calculate how much carbon your corporation must offset to reach net-zero.
en.otherbox2Para: Calculate how much carbon your school must offset to reach net-zero.
en.otherbox3Para: Calculate how much carbon you must personally offset to reach net-zero.
en.sharePersonalFacebook:
I’ve calculated my carbon footprint and am growing it to net Zero by building a forest with Canada's Forest Trust.
 
I’m doing my part, are you?
en.sharePersonalLinkedIn:
Research shows that forests are the most effective way to sequester carbon and mitigate climate change.
 
@CanadasForestTrust has created a unique opportunity for me to offset my impact.
 
How?
 
By building or being part of a communal Smart Forest.
 
Calculate your #carbon footprint and get growing.
en.sharePersonalTwitter:
I’ve calculated my #carbon footprint and am growing it to #netZERO with @CanadasForest Trust.
 
I’m doing my part, are you?
 
#CanadasForestTrust #CFT #SmartForests
en.sharePersonalEmailBody:
Did you know that forests are one of the most effective ways to sequester carbon and mitigate climate change?
 
The research is clear and the need to combat our climate deficit is pressing.
 
Canada’s Forest Trust has created a unique opportunity for me to offset my impact.
 
How?
 
By building or being part of a communal Smart Forest.
 
Calculate your carbon footprint and get growing.
en.shareSchoolFacebook:
With the help of Canada's Forest Trust, We have calculated our carbon footprint.
 
Click the link below to:
 
1) Calculate your carbon footprint
 
2) Start building your forest
 
3) Save the planet
 
4) Start a school fundraiser
 
5) Protect our future by growing to net-zero
en.shareSchoolLinkedIn:
With the help of @CanadasForest Trust, We have calculated our #carbon footprint.
 
We are committed to:
 
1) Growing to net-zero
 
2) Saving our planet
 
3) Motivating our student body to become environmental stewards
 
4) Fundraising for our school
 
5) Protecting the planet and our future by growing to net-zero.
 
Are you?
 
Click the link below to start calculating your school's carbon footprint. #CanadasForestTrust #CFT #SmartForests #EcoSchools #SmartForests
en.shareSchoolTwitter:
With the help of @CanadasForest Trust, we’ve calculated our net-ZERO journey. But, that’s not enough. So, we’re growing to be net-negative! Are you?
 
#CanadasForestTrust #CFT #SmartForests #EcoSchools #SmartSchools
en.shareSchoolEmailSubject: Join us in growing to net-zero
en.shareSchoolEmailBody:
he research is clear. An issue as threatening as climate change needs a solution as smart as forests.
 
That’s why we are growing to net-zero with Canada’s Forest Trust.
 
Click the link below to calculate your carbon footprint, start building your forest, save the planet and help your school.
en.shareCorpFacebook:
We take our ESG seriously.
 
When it comes to climate, having a balanced and long-term approach is non-negotiable.
 
Using Canada's Forest Trusts proprietary calculator, we are building our Smart Forests to grow to net-zero.
 
Click the link below to help mitigate climate change.
en.shareCorpLinkedIn:
The research is clear. An issue as threatening as climate change needs a solution as smart as forests.
 
That’s why we’ve calculate our #carbon footprint using the @CanadasForestTrust proprietary calculator.
 
Join us in taking the first step towards net-ZERO.
en.shareCorpTwitter:
When it comes to climate, having a balanced and long-term approach is non-negotiable.
 
Using @CanadasForest Trusts proprietary calculator, we are on our way to net-zero.
 
Are you?
 
#CanadasForestTrust #CFT #SmartForests #ESG
en.shareCorpEmailSubject: It’s time to grow to net-zero
en.shareCorpEmailBody:
When it comes to climate, having a balanced and long-term approach is non-negotiable.
 
Using Canada’s Forest Trusts proprietary Carbon, net-ZERO and net-NEGATIVE Calculators, we are building Smart Forests to achieve our ESG goals and become net-ZERO.
 
Are you?

fr.title: Calculateur de carboneutralité d'entreprise
fr.para1: Calculez le nombre d’hectares de forêt dans lesquels votre entreprise doit investir pour atteindre la carboneutralité.
fr.para1School: Calculez le nombre d’hectares de forêt dans lesquels votre école doit investir pour atteindre la carboneutralité
fr.para1Personal: Calculez le nombre d’hectares dans lesquels vous devez investir pour atteindre la carboneutralité
fr.emissionsCarbon: Vous n’avez pas calculé votre empreinte carbone?
fr.emissionsPlaceholder: Empreinte carbone en tonnes par année
fr.emissionsRegion: Dans quelle région votre entreprise est-elle établie?
fr.emissionsRegionSchool: Dans quelle région votre école est-elle située?
fr.emissionsTimeHeader: Pendant combien de temps voulez-vous être carboneutre? (Années)
fr.dataDisclaimer: This is an estimate of your average carbon footprint per year.
fr.bookmark: Pour modifier ultérieurement vos résultats, sauvegardez ou mettez en signet ce lien :
fr.nextPara: Calculez votre cible d’émissions négatives nettes
fr.nextButton: Calculez votre cible d’émissions négatives nettes
fr.otherHeader: Commencez avec nos calculateurs d'émissions de carbone
fr.otherbox1Para: Calculez la quantité de carbone que votre entreprise doit séquestrer pour atteindre la carboneutralité.
fr.otherbox2Para: Calculez la quantité de carbone que votre école primaire ou secondaire doit compenser pour atteindre la carboneutralité.
fr.otherbox3Para: Calculez la quantité de carbone que vous devez personnellement compenser pour atteindre la carboneutralité.
